CSS Crash Course - The Essentials

2 November, 2015. It was a Monday.

Hello again, and this post is in continuation of the previous post, CSS Crash Course. If you are wondering what the next stuff mean, you should probably check out the previous article. Anyways, in this post, I will list the most common use cases that you are likely to encounter in lighweight frontend designing. Writing this article more like a cheatsheet, so there is no particular order to the sections.

Centering a DIV

#div {
  margin: 0 auto;
  max-width: 980px;
}
  • html 5
  • css 2
